Source code for src.schemas.user

"""Handle everything related to the request to the User endpoint.
Define the Schemas for the User endpoint.
Export the Schemas.
"""

from typing import Optional

from pydantic import BaseModel



[docs]class User(BaseModel):
    """class for User schema
    Example:
        >>> Schema(id=1, name="John Doe")
    Args:
        BaseModel (pydantic.BaseModel): pydantic BaseModel
        Config (pydantic.BaseConfig): pydantic BaseConfig

    Attributes:
        id (int): Primary key.
        accountNonLocked (bool): Account is locked or not.
        account_type (int): Account type.
        creation_date (datetime): Creation date.
        enabled (bool): Account is enabled or not.
        first_name (str): First name.
        last_name (str): Last name.
        locale (str): Locale.
        password_hash (str): Password hash.
        password_changed_date (datetime): Password changed date.
        password_expiration_interval (int): Password expiration interval.
        password_change_needed (bool): Password change needed or not.
        payment_method (str): Payment method.
        added_companies_count (int): Added companies count.
        added_helpers_count (int): Added helpers count.
        subscription_companies_count (int): Subscription companies count.
        subscription_expiration_date (datetime): Subscription expiration date.
        subscription_helpers_count (int): Subscription helpers count.
        subscription_plan_name (str): Subscription plan name.
        subscription_notes (str): Subscription notes.
        subscription_plan_code (str): Subscription plan code.
        subscription_status (bool): Subscription status.
        username (str): Username.
        parent_id (int): Parent id.
    """

    id: Optional[int]
    accountNonLocked: Optional[bool]
    account_type: Optional[int]
    creation_date: Optional[str]
    enabled: Optional[bool]
    first_name: Optional[str]
    last_name: Optional[str]
    locale: Optional[str]
    password: Optional[str]
    password_changed_date: Optional[str]
    password_expiration_interval: Optional[int]
    password_change_needed: Optional[bool]
    payment_method: Optional[str]
    added_companies_count: Optional[int]
    added_helpers_count: Optional[int]
    subscription_companies_count: Optional[int]
    subscription_expiration_date: Optional[str]
    subscription_helpers_count: Optional[int]
    subscription_plan_name: Optional[str]
    subscription_notes: Optional[str]
    subscription_plan_code: Optional[str]
    subscription_status: Optional[bool]
    username: Optional[str]
    parent_id: Optional[int]


[docs]    class Config:
        """class Config for User schema"""

        schema_extra = dict(
            example=dict(
                username="jhon.doe@example.com",
                first_name="Jhon",
                last_name="Doe",
                password="1234567890",
            )
        )
        orm_mode = True
